channel.title: Any help please!?
channel.description: Do any of you guys recommend a good delta client and source that i should download?? I would appreciate suggestions!

item.title: Any help please!?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

We’re more than happy to help but you have to put fort some effort first. Some quick tips:

[ul][li]In the world of RSPS ambiguity is rarely anyone’s friend, so be very direct and descriptive when requesting anything[/li]
[li]We have a plethora of downloads all of which can be found with a few keywords and the click of a button using our [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=search;advanced]Advanced Search
[list][li]The Advanced Search allows you to to select which sections you want to search in, which is great for weeding out unwanted results.[/li][/list][/li]
[li]A topics subject can make all the difference, be as descriptive as you can when naming your topic.[/li][/ul]

Moved to Download Requests, please modify you post

Read full topic
